title: Southwest Airlines Is Offering $49 Flights In A 3-Day Flash Sale
text:
Published By: Huffington Post Business - Today 
How do you recover from a major customer service disaster? Give away flights for cheap, of course! On the heels of a computer glitch fiascoï¿½...
